casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jose Jesus Garcia LOPEZ. No. 95PA08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 10, 2008. Nora Henry Hargrove, for Lopez. Rex Gore, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of November 2008 by State of NC for extension of time to file brief:

"Motion Allowed. State of NC shall have up to and including the 10th day of December 2008 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of November 2008."
